title: How to Make Lemon Cream Salad Dressing

steps.headline: Wash leaf lettuce and let drain well.
Tear lettuce leaves into bite-size pieces.
Add prepared lettuce leaves to a pretty salad bowl.
Add lemon juice, sugar, salt and pepper to a 2-cup glass measuring cup.
Whisk well while adding small amounts of cream to lemon mixture while whisking.
Whisk until all the cream is added to the lemon juice mixture and the salad dressing thickens slightly.
Pour gently over salad greens and toss gently.

text: Wash leaf lettuce and let drain well.  Tear lettuce leaves into bite-size pieces.  Add prepared lettuce leaves to a pretty salad bowl. Whisk until all the cream is added to the lemon juice mixture and the salad dressing thickens slightly.  Pour gently over salad greens and toss gently.  Serves 6 to 8.
